phrases: So she is a year ahead of us.
She moved here from Tokyo during her first year of middle school.
Her hobbies are oil painting and fencing with naginata.
This has gotten as hard as a rock.
When you think about her, you get a lump in your throat,
so you cannot get the food down, right?
Do not tell me you have never fallen in love before?!
You have got to be kidding me...
If he really falls for that girl,
then he will not get between Ri-chan and me.
Alright, we will skip jazz after school today and meet up to formulate a plan, instead.
We are not going to Ri'ko's basement?
You will be able to relax more at home, right?
If we went to that basement, it is possible Ri-chan would overhear us talking...
We live in a row house, so Ri'ko's place is connected to ours...
I appreciate you always looking out for Sentaro.
I thought you did not have an appetite today.
He told me he was not feeling hungry, which is unusual for him,
but I had a hunch he would be able to eat watermelon, so I iced one up.
Bro, if you plant a watermelon seed, will it grow?
Let us plant one an' see.
Yeesh, do not cry about it!
The four of us will go, including Ri-chan and me.
If you started with just the two of you, she would be on guard.
Of course, you will be the one to invite Miss Yurika.
What is the point if you are not the one who does it?
I just do not have it in me!
You are in a bad mood...
Her full name is Sarah Vaughan.
Since you keep talking about another girl...
Who goes up to the girl and then runs away?!
I would like to take this opportunity to cult... cult...
We are going to Rendezvous Rock, right?
Shall I pack us a lunch?
Just something light, like onigiri, would be good.
By the way, just so I know...
Which of the two of you is inviting me?
Well, I am looking forward to it.
You said okay to a date?!
It was going as smooth as can be and then you blew it!
Yeah, I do not know why I said that...
Wind back time for me, Richie!
Hey, what happened to your face?
Oh, just another one of Sentaro's fights...
Actually, one more person is joining us today...
Making lunch took longer than I thought it would...
You are the girl those hooligans were propositioning at the beach...
The one with the glasses invited me...
What the heck are you doing?!
Is it okay for a newcomer like me to intrude...?
What is wrong with you today?!
Oh, so it was Kaoru-san that asked her...
Kaoru-san must have a weakness for pretty faces...
I was just thinking that your hat is really stylish.
Even if I wore it, I would still look like a yokel...
Ri-chan, when did you change your hairstyle?
I am told your family owns a record shop, Ritsuko-chan.
These two practice playing jazz music together just about every day.
Kaoru-san plays piano and Sentaro is on drums.
I know some people who listen to jazz,
but this is my first time meeting anyone who actually plays it!
My two big brothers like jazz, so I listen too, once in a while.
My brothers frown and get a wrinkle between the eyebrows while they listen,
but I prefer music that really hits you with a bang, you know?
I would like to hear you play the drums.
I still, uh... stink at it!
Oh, but you know you cannot get better at music unless you have an audience.
Come on, let me hear you play.
I think I got scratched by a branch.
Looks like he is got moves...
Say, I heard a rumor that couples who climb together
to the top of that rock will get married.
No girl's going to get up that!
Oh, I am not letting you get away with saying that.
Would anyone like to go with me?
I mean, the sign says it is off limits... and it is dangerous.
I really wanted to see the view from up there.
You should not have wolfed it down!
Those two seem to be getting on well.
I am just going to pick some flowers!
Those shoulders look so sad, but I have no right...
Yurika-san gave it to me as an apology for my towel yesterday!
What the hell was that for?!
I could not let you pick up this handkerchief!
I could not bear seeing that!
If you are here about the handkerchief, you can have it back.
You are satisfied as long as you have this handkerchief, right?!
Go home and sniff on it all you want!
You lookin' to start a fight?
Do not get rough with him!
I do not owe that guy nothing.
This handkerchief is important to you, is not it?
I bet Sentaro is drumming away like a madman right about now.
It is easier to make up if you do it early on.
Kaoru-san, before you moved here, Sentaro always practiced alone.
Shutting himself up in the basement, not letting anyone near him...
But ever since you came, Kaoru-san, that feeling's been gone.
I am positive he was happy to find a friend he could play jazz with.
Kaoru-san, shall I guess what you two were fighting about today?
You like Yurika-san, do not you?
So you got mad at Sentaro for showing off that handkerchief...
I wish I would been born looking like that...
Thanks for trying to cheer me up, Kaoru-san.
I was not trying to cheer you up.
I-I did not come here to see you.
He has the same feelings for the girl he likes.
Hey, do not just join in!
I was not joinin' in anything.
It is jazz with a festival dance beat!
I cannot play if I am laughing!
Next time, maybe I will play something just for Ri-chan...
And then... maybe I will try letting her know how I feel.
Oh, do not be so stiff.
I am sure Ri-chan is thinking about him...
There is a song that I would like to play for you.
Actually, I wanted to practice the song a little more first...
this piece I have secretly been practicing my heart out...
That is the title of the song.
So are you the prince, Kaoru-san?
I am right, are not I?
You have been practicing for Yurika-san, right?
And this is your dress rehearsal!
You are the one that I like...
You do not have to give me an answer right away.
I just wanted to let you know...
She is always thinking of him.
Still, that does not bother me right now...
You taught me that it was possible to fall in love like this.
